[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/bbuchsbaum/fmrireg/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/bbuchsbaum/fmrireg/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
[![Codecov test
coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/bbuchsbaum/fmrireg/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/bbuchsbaum/fmrireg?branch=main)
[![License: GPL
v2](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPL_v2-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.en.html)
[![Lifecycle:
experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)

``` r
bm <- load_benchmark_dataset("BM_Canonical_HighSNR")

# Create an event model
events <- bm$core_data$event_table
sframe <- sampling_frame(blocklens = bm$core_data$run_length, TR = bm$core_data$TR)
emod <- event_model(onset ~ hrf(condition), data = events,
                   block = ~run, sampling_frame = sframe)

# Fit the model
fit <- fmri_lm(emod, dataset = bm$core_data)
```

## Documentation

See comprehensive examples and tutorials in the
[vignettes](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/articles/index.html):

- [Hemodynamic Response
  Functions](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/articles/a_01_hemodynamic_response.html)
- [Building
  Regressors](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/articles/a_02_regressor.html)
- [Event
  Models](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/articles/a_04_event_models.html)
- [Statistical
  Contrasts](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/articles/a_05_contrasts.html)
- [Linear
  Modeling](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/articles/a_09_linear_model.html)

## Performance Configuration

The internal C++ routines use
[RcppParallel](https://rcppcore.github.io/RcppParallel/). You can
control the number of threads by setting the R option
`fmrireg.num_threads` or the environment variable `FMRIREG_NUM_THREADS`
before loading the package. If either is set, `fmrireg` calls
[`RcppParallel::setThreadOptions()`](https://rdrr.io/pkg/RcppParallel/man/setThreadOptions.html)
when it loads.

## Development Status

`fmrireg` is currently in active development. While the core
functionality is stable, the API may change as we continue to improve
the package. Please [file
issues](https://github.com/bbuchsbaum/fmrireg/issues) for bugs or
feature requests.

## Citation

If you use `fmrireg` in your research, please cite:

    Buchsbaum, B. R. (2024). fmrireg: fMRI Analysis in R.
    R package version 0.1.0. https://github.com/bbuchsbaum/fmrireg

# Package index

## All functions

- [`apply_soft_projection()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/apply_soft_projection.md)
  : Apply Soft Projection to Data and Design

- [`ar_parameters()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/ar_parameters.md)
  : Extract Estimated AR Parameters from fmri_lm Fit

- [`as.array(`*`<NeuroVec>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/as.array.NeuroVec.md)
  : Coerce NeuroVec to base array

- [`autoplot(`*`<Reg>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/autoplot.md)
  : Autoplot method for Reg objects

- [`blockids(`*`<event_model>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/blockids.event_model.md)
  : Block IDs for event_model

- [`coef(`*`<fmri_meta>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/coef.fmri_meta.md)
  : Extract Coefficients from Meta-Analysis

- [`coef_image()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/coef_image.md)
  : Extract Image/Volume for Coefficient

- [`coef_image(`*`<fmri_ttest_fit>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/coef_image.fmri_ttest_fit.md)
  : Extract Coefficient Image from fmri_ttest_fit

- [`columns()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/columns.md)
  : Extract Column Names or Identifiers

- [`compute_dvars()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/compute_dvars.md)
  : Compute DVARS (Temporal Derivative of Timecourses)

- [`compute_lm_contrasts()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/compute_lm_contrasts.md)
  : Compute linear model contrast statistics (public API)

- [`compute_lm_contrasts_from_suffstats()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/compute_lm_contrasts_from_suffstats.md)
  : Compute contrast statistics from sufficient statistics (public API)

- [`conditions(`*`<convolved_term>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/conditions.md)
  : Visualize the entire design matrix as a heatmap

- [`contrast()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/contrast.md)
  : Contrast generic

- [`contrast(`*`<fmri_meta>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/contrast.fmri_meta.md)
  : Apply Contrast to Meta-Analysis Results

- [`contrast_set()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/contrast_set.md)
  : Create a contrast set

- [`correlation_map()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/correlation_map.md)
  : correlation_map

- [`correlation_map(`*`<fmri_model>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/correlation_map.fmri_model.md)
  : correlation_map.fmri_model

- [`create_3d_blocks()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/create_3d_blocks.md)
  : Create 3D Blocks for Voxelwise Analysis

- [`create_design_matrix_from_benchmark()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/create_design_matrix_from_benchmark.md)
  : Create Design Matrix from Benchmark Dataset

- [`design_map(`*`<fmri_model>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/design_map.fmri_model.md)
  : Heatmap visualization of the combined fmri_model design matrix

- [`design_matrix(`*`<convolved_term>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/design_matrix.convolved_term.md)
  : Design Matrix for Convolved Terms

- [`design_matrix(`*`<fmri_lm>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/design_matrix.fmri_lm.md)
  : Design Matrix Method for fmri_lm Objects

- [`design_matrix(`*`<fmri_model>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/design_matrix.fmri_model.md)
  : Design Matrix for fMRI Models

- [`design_plot()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/design_plot.md)
  : Design Plot for fMRI Model

- [`.fmrireg_engine_registry`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/dot-fmrireg_engine_registry.md)
  : Plugin registration and helpers for fmrireg

- [`.resample_param()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/dot-resample_param.md)
  : Resample parameter vector with specified distribution

- [`dvars_to_weights()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/dvars_to_weights.md)
  : Convert DVARS to Volume Weights

- [`estimate()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/estimate.md)
  : Deprecated helper: estimate()

- [`estimate_betas()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/estimate_betas.md)
  : Estimate Beta Coefficients for fMRI Data

- [`estimate_betas(`*`<fmri_dataset>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/estimate_betas.fmri_dataset.md)
  : Estimate betas using various regression methods

- [`estimate_betas(`*`<matrix_dataset>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/estimate_betas.matrix_dataset.md)
  : Estimate betas for a matrix dataset

- [`estimate_hrf()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/estimate_hrf.md)
  : Estimate hemodynamic response function (HRF) using Generalized
  Additive Models (GAMs)

- [`evaluate_method_performance()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/evaluate_method_performance.md)
  : Evaluate Method Performance on Benchmark Dataset

- [`event_table(`*`<convolved_term>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/event_table.convolved_term.md)
  : Extract event table from convolved term

- [`extract_csv_data()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/extract_csv_data.md)
  : Extract Data for Meta-Analysis from CSV

- [`extract_nuisance_timeseries()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/extract_nuisance_timeseries.md)
  : Extract Nuisance Timeseries from Mask

- [`fit_contrasts()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fit_contrasts.md)
  : Fit Contrasts

- [`fit_contrasts(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fit_contrasts.default.md)
  : Fit Contrasts for Linear Model (Default Method)

- [`fit_contrasts(`*`<fmri_lm>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fit_contrasts.fmri_lm.md)
  : Fit Contrasts for fMRI Linear Model Objects

- [`fit_glm_from_suffstats()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fit_glm_from_suffstats.md)
  : Fit GLM from sufficient statistics

- [`fit_glm_on_transformed_series()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fit_glm_on_transformed_series.md)
  : Fit the core GLM on a transformed time-series matrix

- [`fit_glm_with_config()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fit_glm_with_config.md)
  : Fit GLM with full config (AR/robust) on a transformed series

- [`fitted_hrf()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fitted_hrf.md)
  : fitted_hrf

- [`fitted_hrf(`*`<fmri_lm>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fitted_hrf.fmri_lm.md)
  : Compute Fitted Hemodynamic Response Functions for an fmri_lm Object

- [`flip_sign()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/flip_sign.md)
  : Flip Sign of Coefficients

- [`fmri_benchmark_datasets`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_benchmark_datasets.md)
  : Benchmark fMRI datasets

- [`fmri_latent_lm()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_latent_lm.md)
  : Fast fMRI Regression Model Estimation from a Latent Component
  Dataset

- [`fmri_lm()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_lm.md)
  : Fit a Linear Regression Model for fMRI Data Analysis

- [`fmri_lm_control()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_lm_control.md)
  : Configuration for fmri_lm fitting

- [`fmri_meta()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_meta.md)
  : Fit Group-Level Meta-Analysis

- [`fmri_meta_fit()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_meta_fit.md)
  : Fit Meta-Analysis Models

- [`fmri_meta_fit_contrasts()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_meta_fit_contrasts.md)
  : Fit Meta-Analysis Models with Exact Contrasts

- [`fmri_meta_fit_cov()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_meta_fit_cov.md)
  : Fit Meta-Analysis and return packed covariance per voxel

- [`fmri_meta_fit_extended()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_meta_fit_extended.md)
  : Extended Meta-Analysis Fit with Voxelwise Covariate

- [`fmri_model()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_model.md)
  : Construct an fMRI Regression Model

- [`fmri_ols_fit()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_ols_fit.md)
  : OLS Fit with Optional Voxelwise Covariate

- [`fmri_rlm()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_rlm.md)
  : Fit a Robust Linear Model for fMRI Data Analysis

- [`fmri_ttest()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/fmri_ttest.md)
  : fmrireg t-tests for Group Analysis

- [`generate_interaction_contrast()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/generate_interaction_contrast.md)
  [`generate_main_effect_contrast()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/generate_interaction_contrast.md)
  : Fast factorial contrast generators

- [`get_benchmark_summary()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/get_benchmark_summary.md)
  : Get Benchmark Dataset Summary

- [`get_contrasts()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/get_contrasts.md)
  : Get Available Contrasts

- [`get_covariates()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/get_covariates.md)
  : Get Covariates

- [`get_rois()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/get_rois.md)
  : Get Available ROIs

- [`get_subjects()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/get_subjects.md)
  : Get Subject IDs

- [`glm_lss()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/glm_lss.md)
  : GLM LSS Estimation Convenience Function (Single Trial Estimation)

- [`glm_ols()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/glm_ols.md)
  : GLM OLS Estimation Convenience Function

- [`group_data()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/group_data.md)
  : Create Group Dataset for Meta-Analysis

- [`group_data_from_csv()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/group_data_from_csv.md)
  : Create Group Dataset from CSV File or Data Frame

- [`group_data_from_fmrilm()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/group_data_from_fmrilm.md)
  : Create Group Dataset from fmri_lm Objects

- [`group_data_from_h5()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/group_data_from_h5.md)
  : Create Group Dataset from HDF5 Files

- [`group_data_from_nifti()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/group_data_from_nifti.md)
  : Create Group Dataset from NIfTI Files

- [`hrf_smoothing_kernel()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/hrf_smoothing_kernel.md)
  : Compute an HRF smoothing kernel

- [`list_benchmark_datasets()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/list_benchmark_datasets.md)
  : List Available Benchmark Datasets

- [`load_benchmark_dataset()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/load_benchmark_dataset.md)
  : Load fMRI Benchmark Datasets

- [`longnames()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/longnames.md)
  : Extract Long Names of Variable Levels

- [`lowrank_control()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/lowrank_control.md)
  : Low-rank / sketch controls for fast GLM

- [`meta_effective_n()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/meta_effective_n.md)
  : Compute Effective Sample Size for Meta-Analysis

- [`meta_fit_vcov_cpp()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/meta_fit_vcov_cpp.md)
  : Meta-regression with ONE voxelwise covariate

- [`mixed_solve_cpp()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/mixed_solve_cpp.md)
  : Mixed Model Solver using Rcpp and roptim

- [`n_subjects()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/n_subjects.md)
  : Extract Number of Subjects

- [`ols_t_cpp()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/ols_t_cpp.md)
  : OLS t-test / ANCOVA across features

- [`ols_t_vcov_cpp()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/ols_t_vcov_cpp.md)
  : OLS with ONE voxelwise covariate

- [`p_values()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/p_values.md)
  : Extract P-values from a Model Fit

- [`paired_diff_block()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/paired_diff_block.md)
  : Helper Functions for fmri_ttest

- [`print(`*`<fmri_model>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/print.md)
  [`print(`*`<fmri_lm>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/print.md)
  [`print(`*`<fmri_rlm>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/print.md)
  : Print an fmri_lm_result object

- [`print(`*`<fmri_meta>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/print.fmri_meta.md)
  : Print Meta-Analysis Results

- [`print(`*`<fmri_ttest_fit>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/print.fmri_ttest_fit.md)
  : Print method for fmri_ttest_fit

- [`print(`*`<group_data>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/print.group_data.md)
  : Print Group Data Object

- [`print(`*`<spatial_fdr_result>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/print.spatial_fdr_result.md)
  : Print Spatial FDR Results

- [`pvalues()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/pvalues.md)
  : Compute P-values from Meta-Analysis

- [`r_to_z()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/r_to_z.md)
  : Convert Correlation to Fisher's Z

- [`read_h5_full()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/read_h5_full.md)
  : Read All Data from HDF5 Files

- [`read_nifti_full()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/read_nifti_full.md)
  : Read All Data from NIfTI Files

- [`register_basis()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/register_basis.md)
  : Register an HRF/basis constructor

- [`register_engine()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/register_engine.md)
  :

  Register a plugin engine for `fmri_lm`

- [`resolve_basis()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/resolve_basis.md)
  : Resolve a registered basis function by name

- [`se()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/se.md) :
  Extract Standard Errors from Meta-Analysis

- [`shortnames()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/shortnames.md)
  : Short Names

- [`simulate_bold_signal()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/simulate_bold_signal.md)
  : Simulate fMRI Time Series

- [`simulate_fmri_matrix()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/simulate_fmri_matrix.md)
  : Simulate fMRI Time Courses, Return Shared Onsets + Column-Specific
  Amplitudes/Durations

- [`simulate_noise_vector()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/simulate_noise_vector.md)
  : Simulate fMRI Noise

- [`simulate_simple_dataset()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/simulate_simple_dataset.md)
  : Simulate Complete fMRI Dataset

- [`soft_projection()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/soft_projection.md)
  : Create Soft Projection Operator

- [`soft_subspace_options()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/soft_subspace_options.md)
  : Soft Subspace Control Options

- [`soft_subspace_projection`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/soft_subspace_projection.md)
  : Soft Subspace Projection for Nuisance Removal

- [`spatial_fdr()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/spatial_fdr.md)
  : Spatially-Aware Multiple Comparisons Correction

- [`standard_error()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/standard_error.md)
  : Extract Standard Errors from a Model Fit

- [`stats()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/stats.md) :
  Extract Test Statistics from a Model Fit

- [`summary(`*`<fmri_meta>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/summary.fmri_meta.md)
  : Summary of Meta-Analysis Results

- [`summary(`*`<fmri_ttest_fit>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/summary.fmri_ttest_fit.md)
  : Summary method for fmri_ttest_fit

- [`summary(`*`<group_data>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/summary.group_data.md)
  : Summary of Group Data Object

- [`summary(`*`<spatial_fdr_result>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/summary.spatial_fdr_result.md)
  : Summary of Spatial FDR Results

- [`t_to_beta_se()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/t_to_beta_se.md)
  : Convert t-statistics to Effect Sizes

- [`t_to_d()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/t_to_d.md)
  : Convert T-statistics to Effect Sizes and Variances

- [`term_matrices(`*`<fmri_model>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/term_matrices.fmri_model.md)
  : Extract term matrices from fmri_model

- [`tidy()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/tidy.md) :
  Tidy generic

- [`tidy(`*`<fmri_meta>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/tidy.fmri_meta.md)
  : Tidy Meta-Analysis Results

- [`volume_quality`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/volume_quality.md)
  : Volume Quality Metrics and Temporal Weighting

- [`volume_weights()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/volume_weights.md)
  : Compute Volume Quality Weights from Data

- [`welch_t_cpp()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/welch_t_cpp.md)
  : Welch two-sample t-test across features

- [`write_results()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/write_results.md)
  : Write Results from fMRI Analysis

- [`write_results(`*`<fmri_lm>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/write_results.fmri_lm.md)
  : Write Results from fMRI Linear Model

- [`write_results(`*`<fmri_meta>`*`)`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/write_results.fmri_meta.md)
  : Write Meta-Analysis Results

- [`z_to_r()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/z_to_r.md)
  : Back-transform Fisher's Z to Correlation

- [`zscores()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/fmrireg/reference/zscores.md)
  : Compute Z-scores from Meta-Analysis
